title: [Fix] Handle redirections with cookies
body: Needs: https://github.com/owncloud/android-library/pull/343

title: [Docs] Add FAQ
body:
## Description

- FAQ page added

## How Has This Been Tested?

```
git clone https://github.com/owncloud/android.git
cd android
git checkout docs/faq
cd docs
yarn install
yarn antora
yarn serve
```

Test http://localhost:8080/android/faq.html

title: [Feature] Android Sharesheet
body:
Implements #2902 partially.

We cannot [exclude oC from sharing targets till API 24](https://developer.android.com/training/sharing/send#excluding-specific-targets-by-component), so we'll keep the previous behaviour for API <24, and use sharesheet for newer ones.

Old code will be removed when we upgrade min_sdk_version to api 24.

title: Fix remote service exception
body: Fixes #2953

title: Potential fix to anr related with camera uploads retries
body:
It may fix #2561 according to logs.

We have this log:
`Context.startForegroundService() did not then call Service.startForeground(): ServiceRecord{24fee0 u0 com.owncloud.android/.files.services.FileUploader}`

This code determines if it is needed to call startForegroundService.
`if ((isCameraUploadFile || isAvailableOfflineFile || isRequestedFromWifiBackEvent) &&
                Build.VERSION.SDK_INT >= Build.VERSION_CODES.O) {`

In the retry function, we launch a foreground service but we send only `isRequestedFromWifiBackEvent`. If it is not, `startForegroundService` is not called in the FileUploader.

With this change, we will send how it was created, and if it was created by camera uploads, it will call `startForegroundService`

title: [New arch] Get folder content
body: Implements #2956

title: [Docs-only] update dependencies for the documentation
body: Updated dependencies for documentation to get rid of the security alerts.

body:
Currently there are some operations that need to save file info into the database. To achieve that, we can simply create a usecase to keep the current behaviour.

- [ ] Development tasks

  - [ ] Add saveFile to FileRepository
  - [ ] Add saveFile to FileLocalDataSource
  - [ ] Add saveFile to FileDao if it is not added yet
  - [ ] Add domain unit tests
  - [ ] Add data unit tests
- [ ] Code review and apply changes requested
- [ ] Design test plan
- [ ] QA
- [ ] Merge branch feature/feature_name into master

### PR

- App
- Library (if needed)

title: [New arch] Get file by id or path
body:
Next step to new architecture, is to retrieve file/folder info from new database. Currently, files are retrieved by their id or path, so it would be enough to keep the current behaviour.

### TASKS

  - [x] Implement dao

  - [x] Add tests for data layer 
- [x] Code review and apply changes requested
- [X] Design test plan [no needed - after migration]
- [X] QA  [no needed- after migration]

### PR

- App https://github.com/owncloud/android/pull/2962
- Library (if needed)

title: [New arch] Get folder content
body:
Related with #2955, we need to get the folder content from the local database in order to show the file list, so this should be one of the first issues to take care of after the migration.

For the moment, it would be enough to retrieve a list of files and keep the previous behaviour.

BTW, we can include GetImagesFromFolder use case since it is simply an aditional filter in the database.

In the future, we could use Flow or LiveData to improve the performance and error handling.

### TASKS

- [x] Research (if needed)
- [x] Create branch new_arch/get_folder_content
- [x] Development tasks
  - [x] Implement usecase for get folder content
  - [x] Implement usecase for get folder images
  - [x] Implement repository
  - [x] Implement localdatasource
  - [x] Implement dao
  - [x] Add tests for domain layer
  - [x] Add tests for data layer 
- [ ] Code review and apply changes requested
- [x] Design test plan [no needed - after migration]
- [x] QA [no needed - after migration]
- [ ] Merge branch new_arch/get_folder_content into new_arch/synchronization


### PR

- [app](https://github.com/owncloud/android/pull/2965)
- Library (if needed)

title: [New Arch] Migrate OCFile to new database
body:
To continue with the new architecture, we will need to migrate completely the old file database to the new one (Room).

This step will help us to develop the other synchronization issues faster, because we won't need to take care of two different databases and different ocfile models.

But this migration has different inconveniences since OCFile is present everywhere, and we will need to disable some functionalities until we finish completely the rearquitecture.

1. FileDataStorageManager handles every old database queries. So we will need to transform those operations to usecases. Some of them are currently planned, others may require new issues. Including:
- Get file by path, id.. #2957 
- Get folder content #2956 
- Get images from folder #2956 
- Save folder/file #2958
- Remove file/folder #2864 (includes local removal)
- Move file/folder #2865 (includes local move)
- Copy file/folder #2866 (includes local copy)
- Conflicts management
- Av. Offline management
- Shared by link management

2. Since the main idea is to release a version once we complete the rearquitecture, we could disable some features temporarely in the new_arch/synchronization branch, and work in different issues. For example:
- Camera Uploads
- Downloads #2872 
- Uploads
- Av. Offline synchronization
- DocumentsProvider integration

Once we have a compiling version, @jesmrec could start QA on each single functionality instead of waiting till the end of sync rearquitecture.

### PR
- App
- Library (if needed)

title: Accept both display-name  and displayname as nodes in user endpoint response
body:
From https://github.com/owncloud/product/issues/181#issuecomment-685782818

two user endpoint returns inside its "data" node, different stuff:

/cloud/users/admin 

```
"data": {
      ...
      "displayname": "admin",
      ...
}
```

/cloud/user

```
"data": {
      ...
      "display-name": "admin",
      ...
}
```

App should support both

title: [BUG] Av. offline from scratch
body:
From time to time, i've detected the following error:

```
2020-09-09 17:14:04.648 24091-24091/? E/AndroidRuntime: FATAL EXCEPTION: main
    Process: com.owncloud.android, PID: 24091
    android.app.RemoteServiceException: Bad notification for startForeground
        at android.app.ActivityThread$H.handleMessage(ActivityThread.java:2005)
        at android.os.Handler.dispatchMessage(Handler.java:106)
        at android.os.Looper.loop(Looper.java:223)
        at android.app.ActivityThread.main(ActivityThread.java:7656)
        at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Native Method)
        at com.android.internal.os.RuntimeInit$MethodAndArgsCaller.run(RuntimeInit.java:592)
        at com.android.internal.os.ZygoteInit.main(ZygoteInit.java:947)
```

Steps:

1. Install from scratch
2. Set a file to available offline

Current: app crashes
Expected: available offline

Android 9

Related PR: https://github.com/owncloud/android/pull/2967

title: Bump http-proxy from 1.17.0 to 1.18.1 in /docs

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

body:
Bumps [http-proxy](https://github.com/http-party/node-http-proxy) from 1.17.0 to 1.18.1.
Changelog

Sourced from http-proxy's changelog.

v1.18.1 - 2020-05-17

Merged

  • Skip sending the proxyReq event when the expect header is present [#1447](https://github.com/http-party/node-http-proxy/issues/1447)
  • Remove node6 support, add node12 to build [#1397](https://github.com/http-party/node-http-proxy/issues/1397)

1.18.0 - 2019-09-18

Merged

  • Added in auto-changelog module set to keepachangelog format [#1373](https://github.com/http-party/node-http-proxy/issues/1373)
  • fix 'Modify Response' readme section to avoid unnecessary array copying [#1300](https://github.com/http-party/node-http-proxy/issues/1300)
  • Fix incorrect target name for reverse proxy example [#1135](https://github.com/http-party/node-http-proxy/issues/1135)
  • Fix modify response middleware example [#1139](https://github.com/http-party/node-http-proxy/issues/1139)
  • [dist] Update dependency async to v3 [#1359](https://github.com/http-party/node-http-proxy/issues/1359)
  • Fix path to local http-proxy in examples. [#1072](https://github.com/http-party/node-http-proxy/issues/1072)
  • fix reverse-proxy example require path [#1067](https://github.com/http-party/node-http-proxy/issues/1067)
  • Update README.md [#970](https://github.com/http-party/node-http-proxy/issues/970)
  • [dist] Update dependency request to ~2.88.0 [SECURITY] [#1357](https://github.com/http-party/node-http-proxy/issues/1357)
  • [dist] Update dependency eventemitter3 to v4 [#1365](https://github.com/http-party/node-http-proxy/issues/1365)
  • [dist] Update dependency colors to v1 [#1360](https://github.com/http-party/node-http-proxy/issues/1360)
  • [dist] Update all non-major dependencies [#1356](https://github.com/http-party/node-http-proxy/issues/1356)
  • [dist] Update dependency agentkeepalive to v4 [#1358](https://github.com/http-party/node-http-proxy/issues/1358)
  • [dist] Update dependency nyc to v14 [#1367](https://github.com/http-party/node-http-proxy/issues/1367)
  • [dist] Update dependency concat-stream to v2 [#1363](https://github.com/http-party/node-http-proxy/issues/1363)
  • x-forwarded-host overwrite for mutli level proxies [#1267](https://github.com/http-party/node-http-proxy/issues/1267)
  • [refactor doc] Complete rename to http-party org. [#1362](https://github.com/http-party/node-http-proxy/issues/1362)
  • Highlight correct lines for createProxyServer [#1117](https://github.com/http-party/node-http-proxy/issues/1117)
  • Fix docs for rewrite options - 201 also handled [#1147](https://github.com/http-party/node-http-proxy/issues/1147)
  • Update .nyc_output [#1339](https://github.com/http-party/node-http-proxy/issues/1339)
  • Configure Renovate [#1355](https://github.com/http-party/node-http-proxy/issues/1355)
  • [examples] Restream body before proxying, support for Content-Type of application/x-www-form-urlencoded [#1264](https://github.com/http-party/node-http-proxy/issues/1264)

Commits

  • [dist] New test fixtures. 7e4a0e5
  • [dist] End of an era. a9b09cc
  • [dist] Version bump. 1.18.0 9bbe486
  • [fix] Latest versions. 59c4403
  • [fix test] Update tests. dd1d08b
  • [dist] Update dependency ws to v3 [SECURITY] b00911c
  • [dist] .gitattributes all the things. fc93520
  • [dist] Regenerate package-lock.json. 16d4f8a
Commits
  • 9b96cd7 1.18.1
  • 335aeeb Skip sending the proxyReq event when the expect header is present (#1447)
  • dba3966 Remove node6 support, add node12 to build (#1397)
  • 9bbe486 [dist] Version bump. 1.18.0
  • 6e4bef4 Added in auto-changelog module set to keepachangelog format (#1373)
  • d056241 fix 'Modify Response' readme section to avoid unnecessary array copying (#1300)
  • 244303b Fix incorrect target name for reverse proxy example (#1135)
  • b4028ba Fix modify response middleware example (#1139)
  • 77a9815 [dist] Update dependency async to v3 (#1359)
  • c662f9e Fix path to local http-proxy in examples. (#1072)
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view

title: Fix npe when browsing up
body:
Crash when browsing up reported to Google play console. 

Stacktrace:
```
java.lang.NullPointerException: 
  at com.owncloud.android.ui.fragment.OCFileListFragment.listDirectory (OCFileListFragment.java:983)
  at com.owncloud.android.ui.fragment.OCFileListFragment.lambda$listDirectoryWidthAnimationUp$4$OCFileListFragment (OCFileListFragment.java:764)

  at android.app.ActivityThread.main (ActivityThread.java:6986)
```

title: Fix npe when logging camera upload request
body:
According to google play console, account could be null at that point and it causes a null pointer exception when we log it.

Stacktrace:
`Caused by: java.lang.NullPointerException: 
  at com.owncloud.android.files.services.CameraUploadsSyncJobService$CameraUploadsSyncJobTask.handleFile (CameraUploadsSyncJobService.java:216)
  at com.owncloud.android.files.services.CameraUploadsSyncJobService$CameraUploadsSyncJobTask.syncFiles (CameraUploadsSyncJobService.java:127)
  at com.owncloud.android.files.services.CameraUploadsSyncJobService$CameraUploadsSyncJobTask.doInBackground (CameraUploadsSyncJobService.java:98)
  at com.owncloud.android.files.services.CameraUploadsSyncJobService$CameraUploadsSyncJobTask.doInBackground (CameraUploadsSyncJobService.java:58)`
